name: water
description: This is water. Water, the stuff of life, the best thirst-quencher available. You're not sure if it's clean, though.

name: clean water
description: This is Fresh, clean water. Truly the best thing to quench your thirst.

name: sewage sample
description: This is a sample of sewage from a treatment plant. Gross.

name: salt water
description: This is water with salt added. It isn't good for drinking.

name: orange juice
description: This is juice from an orange. It's freshly-squeezed from real oranges! It's tasty and nutritious.

name: apple cider
description: This is juice, pressed from fresh apples. It's tasty and nutritious.

name: lemonade
description: This is lemon juice mixed with water and sugar to dull the sourness. It's delicious and refreshing.

name: cranberry juice
description: This is made from real Massachusetts cranberries. It's delicious and nutritious.

name: sports drink
description: Consisting of a special blend of electrolytes and simple sugars, this beverage tastes like bottled sweat but rehydrates the body faster than water.

name: energy drink
description: This energy drink is popular among those who need to stay up late working.

name: cola
description: Things go better with cola. It's really just sugar water with caffeine added.

name: root beer
description: It's like cola, but without caffeine. Still, it's not that healthy.

name: grape drink
description: This is a mass-produced grape flavored beverage of artificial origin. It'd be good for when you want something that tastes like fruit, but still don't care about your health.

name: milk
description: This is baby cow food, appropriated for adult humans. It spoils rapidly.

name: condensed milk
description: This is baby cow food, appropriated for adult humans. Having been canned, this milk should last for a very long time.

name: V8
description: The can says, 'Contains up to 8 vegetables!' It's nutritious and tasty.

name: broth
description: This is vegetable stock. It's tasty and fairly nutritious, and would be useful for making soups.

name: bone broth
description: This is some tasty and nutritious broth made from bones.

name: vegetable soup
description: This is some nutritious and delicious hearty vegetable soup.

name: meat soup
description: This is some nutritious and delicious hearty meat soup.

name: woods soup
description: This is some nutritious and delicious soup, made from the gifts of nature.

name: sap soup
description: This is some soup made from someone who is a far better meal than person.

name: riesling
description: This is sparkling white wine, made from the world's noblest grape.

name: chardonnay
description: This is some of America's most popular wine, and for good reason.

name: cabernet sauvignon
description: This is the heavily disputed king of red wines. It pairs well red meats and pasta.

name: pinot noir
description: Prized by collectors and adored by critics, this is one of the rarer and more elegant wines.

name: whiskey
description: The label on this bottle reads, 'Made from, by, and for real Southern colonels!'

name: vodka
description: The label on this bottle reads, 'In Soviet Russia, vodka drinks you!'

name: gin
description: This hard alcohol smells faintly of elderberries, but mostly just booze.

name: rum
description: Drinking this might make you feel like a pirate. Or not.

name: tequila
description: Don't eat the worm! Wait, there's no worm in this bottle.

name: triple sec
description: This is an orange flavored liquor used in many mixed drinks.

name: cheap wine
description: This is really cheap fortified wine.

name: Irish coffee
description: This is sweetened coffee and whiskey. Start your day the closeted alcoholic way!

name: long island iced tea
description: This is a blend of incredibly strong-flavored liquors that somehow tastes like none of them.

name: screwdriver
description: This is the surreptitious drunkard mechanic's drink of choice.

name: wild apple
description: This is like apple cider, only with vodka.

name: beer
description: This is a can of beer. It'd be best served cold, in a glass, and with a lime - but you're not that lucky.

name: bleach
description: This is sodium hypochlorite, a common household cleaning agent. It is highly unsafe to drink.

name: ammonia
description: This is ammonium hydroxide, a common household cleaning agent. It is highly unsafe to drink.

name: plant food
description: This is plant fertilizer. Don't drink it; feed it to your plants!

name: acid water
description: This is water collected during an acid rainstorm. Don't drink it. Boiling it down could concentrate the acid.

name: weak acid water
description: This is a mixture of rain and acid rain. Don't drink it. Boiling it down could concentrate the acid.

name: concentrated acid
description: This is concentrated acid. Don't drink it.

name: mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: plant mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: insect mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: spider mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: slime mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: fish mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: rat mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: beast mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: cattle mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: cephalopod mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: bird mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: lizard mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: troglobite mutagen
description: This is a rare substance of uncertain origins. The label on the flask reads, 'MUTAGENIC COMPOUND.' You wonder what drinking it would do...

name: purifier
description: The label on this flask reads, 'Stem-cell anti-mutagenic treatment solution.' It could reverse mutations and treat genetic defects.

name: tea
description: This is tea, the beverage of ladies and gentlemen everywhere.

name: kompot
description: This is a clear juice obtained by cooking fruit in a large volume of water.

name: coffee
description: This is coffee. It was morning ritual drink of the pre-apocalypse world.

name: chocolate drink
description: This is a chocolate flavored beverage made of artifical flavoring and milk byproducts. It's shelf stable and vaguely appetizing even when lukewarm.

name: blood
description: This is blood, possibly that of a human. Disgusting! (Or tasty, depending on your proclivities.)

name: bone
description: This is a bone from some creature or other. It could be eaten or used to make some stuff, like needles.

name: fluid sac
description: This is a fluid bladder from a plant based lifeform. It isn't very nutritious, but at least it's fine to eat anyway.

name: chunk of meat
description: This is freshly butchered meat. You could eat it raw, but cooking it is better.

name: plant marrow
description: This is a nutrient rich chunk of plant matter, it could be eaten raw or cooked.

name: human flesh
description: Freshly butchered from a human body. What did you plan to do with it?

name: wild vegetables
description: This is an assortment of edible-looking wild plants. Most are quite bitter-tasting.

name: tainted meat
description: Meat that's obviously unhealthy. You could eat it, but it would most certainly poison you.

name: tainted veggy
description: This is some kind of vegetable that looks poisonous. You could eat it, but it would most certainly poison you.

name: cooked meat
description: This is freshly cooked meat. It's very nutritious, and delicious!.

name: smoked meat
description: This is some tasty meat that has been heavily smoked for long term preservation.

name: sausage
description: This is a hefty sausage that has been cured for long term storage.

name: cooked creep
description: This is a freshly cooked slice of some unpleasant person. It tastes great!

name: smoked sucker
description: This is a heavily smoked portion of human flesh. It lasts for a very long time and tastes pretty good, if you like that sort of thing.

name: Mannwurst
description: This is a hefty long pork sausage that has been cured for long term storage. Very tasty, if you're in the market for human flesh.

name: cooked plant marrow
description: This is a freshly cooked chunk of edible plant matter, tasty and nutritious.

name: cooked wild vegetables
description: This a mixture of some cooked wild edible plants. It's an interesting mix of flavours.

name: apple
description: This is an apple. An apple a day keeps the doctor away.

name: banana
description: This is a long, curved yellow fruit in a peel. Some people like using them in desserts. Those people are probably dead.

name: orange
description: This is a sweet citrus fruit. It's also known to come in juice form.

name: lemon
description: This is a very sour citrus fruit. It could be eaten if you really want.

name: fruit leather
description: These are sweet dried strips of sugary fruit paste.

name: potato chips
description: This bag of junk food is challenging you; 'Betcha can't eat just one.'

name: potato chips
description: This is a bag of cheap, own-brand chips.

name: potato chips
description: Oh man, you love these chips! Score!

name: popcorn kernels
description: These are dried kernels from a particular type of corn. While practically inedible raw, they can be cooked to make a tasty snack.

name: popcorn
description: This is plain and unseasoned popcorn. Not as tasty as other kinds, but healthier as a result.

name: salted popcorn
description: This is popcorn with salt added for extra flavor.

name: buttered popcorn
description: This is popcorn with a light covering of butter for extra flavor.

name: pretzels
description: This is a salty snack treat of twisted bread products.

name: chocolate bar
description: This is a chocolate bar. Chocolate isn't very healthy, but it does make a delicious treat.

name: meat jerky
description: This is some salty dried meat that never goes bad, but will make you thirsty.

name: jerk jerky
description: This is salty dried human flesh that never goes bad, but will make you thirsty. Maybe you could wash it down with some blood?

name: meat sandwich
description: This is the biggest improvement to sliced bread, where someone stuck some meat between it. That's all it is.

name: candy
description: This is a big bag of peanut butter cups... your favorite!

name: mushroom
description: These mushrooms look tasty, but be careful. Some can poison you, while others are hallucinogenic.

name: mushroom
description: These mushrooms look tasty, but be careful. Some can poison you, while others are hallucinogenic.

name: mushroom
description: These mushrooms look tasty, but be careful. Some can poison you, while others are hallucinogenic.

name: blueberries
description: These are tiny blue fruits, but that doesn't mean they're sad.

name: blueberry seeds
description: These are some blueberry seeds.

name: strawberries
description: This is a tasty juicy red berry, often found growing wild in fields.

name: strawberry seeds
description: These are some strawberry seeds.

name: wheat
description: This is some raw wheat, not very tasty in this particular configuration.

name: wheat seeds
description: These are some wheat seeds.

name: lettuce
description: This is a crisp head of iceberg lettuce, the most extreme of the lettuces.

name: tomato
description: This is a nice, juicy red tomato. It gained popularity in Italy after being brought back from the New World.

name: broccoli
description: This is some leafy green broccoli. It's a bit tough, but quite delicious.

name: zucchini
description: This is a tasty summer squash.

name: onion
description: This is an aromatic onion used in cooking. Cutting these up can make your eyes sting!
fun_comment: Raw onions probably aren't all that tasty to most people.

name: carrots
description: This is a healthy root vegetable. They're rich in vitamin A!

name: corn
description: These are delicious golden kernels o' corn.

name: frozen dinner
description: The label reads, 'Now with ONE POUND of meat and ONE POUND of carbs!' It's not as appetizing or nutritious as it would be if heated up.

name: cooked TV dinner
description: The label reads, 'Now with ONE POUND of meat and ONE POUND of carbs!' Now it's nice and heated up. It's tastier and more filling, but will also spoil quickly.

name: raw spaghetti
description: These are raw spaghetti noodles. They could be eaten raw if you're desperate, but it'd be much better cooked.

name: boiled noodles
description: These are fresh, cooked, wet noodles. It's fairly bland, but at least it fills you up.

name: raw macaroni
description: This a box of elbow pasta with a package of flavoring in it. The label reads, 'When the cheese starts flowing, Kraft gets your noodle going.' You could eat this stuff raw, if there wasn't any alternative.

name: mac & cheese
description: This is some cooked macaroni and cheese. It tastes better than you'd imagine beforehand.

name: ravioli
description: This is meat encased in little dough satchels. Tastes fine right out of the can.

name: red sauce
description: This is tomato sauce, yum yum.

name: pesto
description: This is a jar of olive oil, basil, garlic, pine nuts, all minced and mixed. It's simple and delicious.

name: beans
description: These are canned beans. This is a staple among canned goods, these are reputedly good for one's coronary health. The label reads, 'EXPIRES JUNE 5th 2067.'

name: corn
description: This is canned corn in water. Eat up!

name: SPAM
description: This is a canned pork product that is unnaturally pink and oddly rubbery. It's not very tasty but this SPAM remains quite filling. Again, it's completely unappetizing, but quite filling.

name: canned pineapple
description: These are canned pineapple rings in water. They're quite tasty.

name: coconut milk
description: This is a dense, sweet creamy sauce, often used in curries.

name: canned sardines
description: This is a can of salty little fish. They'll make you thirsty.

name: canned tuna fish
description: This is a can of white albacore tuna. The label reads, 'Now with 95 percent less dolphins!'

name: canned salmon
description: It's bright pink fish-paste in a can! This wouldn't be a good idea to serve for parties, though.

name: pickled herring
description: This is a jar of fish fillets pickled in some sort of tangy white sauce.

name: canned clams
description: These are canned and chopped quahog clams in water.

name: clam chowder
description: This is delicious, lumpy, white soup made of clams and potatoes. This is a taste of the lost glory of New England.

name: cat food
description: The mere thought of eating this stuff is enough to make your hair stand on end. Save it for when you're about to die of starvation.

name: honey comb
description: This is a large chunk of wax, filled with honey. It looks and smells very tasty.

name: wax
description: This is a large chunk of beeswax. It's not very tasty or nourishing, but okay in an emergency.

name: royal jelly
description: This is a translucent hexagonal chunk of wax, filled with dense, milky jelly. It actually smells delicious, and looks rich in nutrients from the most beneficial substances the hive can produce. You're not sure, but you feel healthier just smelling it.

name: misshapen fetus
description: This is a deformed human fetus. Eating this would be the most vile thing you can think of. It would probably cause some weird health issues to boot.

name: mutated arm
description: This is a misshapen human arm. Eating this would be incredibly disgusting, and probably cause weird health issues.

name: mutated leg
description: This is a malformed human leg. Eating this would be incredibly disgusting, and probably cause weird health issues.

name: ant egg
description: This is a large white ant egg, the size of a softball. It's extremely nutritious, but incredibly gross. You really hope it isn't going to turn into a larvae soon.

name: marloss berry
description: This looks like a blueberry the size of your fist, but pinkish in color. It has a strong but delicious aroma, but is clearly either mutated or of alien origin. You could eat it, you suppose...

name: flour
description: This enriched white flour is useful for baking.

name: cornmeal
description: This is yellow cornmeal, and is useful for baking.

name: oatmeal
description: These are dry flakes of flattened grain. Tasty and nutritious when cooked, it also doubles as food for horses while dry.

name: cooked oatmeal
description: This is a filling and nutritious New England classic that has sustained pioneers and captains of industry alike.

name: deluxe cooked oatmeal
description: This is a filling and nutritious New England classic that has been improved with the addition of extra wholesome ingredients.

name: sugar
description: This is sweet, sweet sugar. Bad for your teeth and surprisingly not very tasty on its own.

name: salt
description: This is sodium chloride, also known as table salt. Yuck, you surely wouldn't want to eat this straight. It's good for preserving meat and cooking with, though.

name: bone meal
description: This bone meal is useful for fertilizing plants.

name: chitin powder
description: This chitin powder is useful for fertilizing plants.

name: Italian seasoning
description: This is a fragrant mix of dried oregano, basil, thyme and other spices.

name: seasoned salt
description: This is salt mixed with a fragrant blend of secret herbs and spices.

name: black pepper
description: This is dried and ground black spice berries with a pungent aroma.

name: powdered eggs
description: These are whole fresh eggs, dehydrated into an easy to store and long lasting powder.

name: scrambled eggs
description: These are fluffy and delicious scrambled eggs.

name: deluxe scrambled eggs
description: These are fluffy and delicious scrambled eggs made more delicious with the addition of other tasty ingredients.

name: bacon
description: This is a thick slab of salty cured bacon.

name: raw potato
description: This is the common table tuber. It's mildly toxic and not very tasty raw. When cooked, it is delicious.

name: baked potato
description: This is a delicious baked potato. Got any sour cream?

name: bread
description: This is a decent sized slice of bread, it's healthy and filling.

name: cornbread
description: This is simple, healthy, and filling cornbread.

name: johnnycake
description: This is a tasty and nutritious fried bread treat.

name: pancakes
description: These are fluffy and delicious pancakes with real maple syrup.

name: fruit pancakes
description: These are fluffy and delicious pancakes with real maple syrup, made sweeter and healthier with the addition of wholesome fruit.

name: crackers
description: Dry and salty, these crackers will leave you quite thirsty.

name: cookies
description: These are sweet and delicious cookies, just like grandma used to bake.

name: maple syrup
description: Sweet and delicious, this is real Vermont maple syrup.

name: hardtack
description: This is a dry and virtually tasteless bread product capable of remaining edible without spoilage for vast lengths of time.

name: biscuit
description: Delicious and filling, this home made biscuit is good, and good for you! Too bad you don't have any gravy, though.

name: fruit pie
description: This is a delicious baked pie with a sweet fruit filling.

name: vegetable pizza
description: This is a vegetarian pizza, with some delicious tomato sauce and a fluffy crust. Its smell brings back great memories.

name: meat pizza
description: This is a meat pizza, for all the carnivores out there. It's chock full of minced meat and heavily seasoned.

name: MRE - meat
description: This is a Meal Ready to Eat. As a military ration, it's not very tasty, but it is very filling, nutritious, and will not spoil. The label reads, 'MENU#2 BEEF STROGANOFF'

name: MRE - vegetable
description: This is a Meal Ready to Eat. As a military ration, it's not very tasty, but it is very filling, nutritious, and will not spoil. The label reads, 'MENU#1 VEGETABLE LASANGA'

name: tea leaves
description: These are dried leaves of some tropical plants. You can boil them into tea, or you can just eat them raw. They aren't too filling, though.

name: coffee powder
description: These are ground coffee beans. You can boil it with water into a mediocre but delicious stimulant, or swallow it raw for a lesser stimulative boost.

name: powdered milk
description: This is dehydrated milk powder. Mix with water to make drinkable milk, or try and eat the powder if you are really that desperate.

name: coffee syrup
description: This is a thick syrup made of water and sugar strained through coffee grounds. It can be used to flavor many foods and beverages.

name: cake
description: This is delicious sponge cake with buttercream icing, it says happy birthday in decorative lettering written with frosting. You don't care that it's probably not your birthday, do you?

name: canned meat
description: This is some low-sodium preserved meat. It was boiled and canned. Contains all of the nutrition, but little of the savoriness of cooked meat.

name: canned veggy
description: This mushy pile of vegetable matter was boiled and canned in an earlier life. You'd better eat it before it oozes through your fingers.

name: canned fruit
description: This is a sealed glass jar containing preserved fruit. It's bland, mushy and losing color.

name: soylent slices
description: This is a jar of low-sodium preserved human meat. He or she was boiled and canned. It contains all of the nutrition, but little of the savoriness of cooked meat.

name: salted meat slices
description: These are meat slices cured in brine and vacuum-packed. As this was meant to be prepared with other ingredients, it's salty but tasty in a pinch.

name: salted veggy chunks
description: These are vegetable chunks pickled in a salt bath. It goes well with burgers, if you can find one.

name: fruit slices
description: These are fruit slices soaked in a sugar syrup, to preserve freshness and appearance.

name: spaghetti bolognese
description: This is spaghetti covered with a thick meat sauce.  Yum!

name: spaghetti al pesto
description: This is spaghetti, with a generous helping of pesto on top.  Yum!

name: bandages
description: These are simple cloth bandages. They are used for healing small amounts of damage, or staunching a bleeding wound.

name: first aid kit
description: This is a full medical kit, with bandages, local anaesthetics, and rapid healing agents. It's used for healing large amounts of damage.

name: vitamins
description: These are essential dietary nutrients conveniently packaged in pill form. Take these frequently to help regulate your body's health and immune functions.

name: flu shot
description: This is a pharmaceutical flu shot designed for mass vaccinations and still in the packaging. It's purported to provide some kind of immunity.

name: adrenaline injector
description: This is a syringe filled with a shot of adrenaline. It serves as a powerful stimulant when you inject yourself with it. Asthmatics can use it in an emergency to clear their asthma.

name: aspirin
description: This is acetylsalicylic acid, a mild anti-inflammatory analgesic. Take to relieve pain and swelling. It's best to avoid ingesting with alcohol or other painkillers.

name: caffeine pills
description: These are No-doz brand caffeine pills, maximum strength. They're useful in pulling an all-nighter; one pill is about equivalent to a strong cup of coffee.

name: Ambien
description: This is a habit-forming tranquilizer with a variety of psychoactive side effects. It's used in the treatment of insomnia.

name: iodine tablets
description: These are potassium iodide tablets. They might help mitigate some of the detrimental effects caused by irradiation.

name: Dayquil
description: This is daytime cold and flu medication. It contains a non-drowsy formula. It will suppress coughing, aching, headaches and runny noses, but you'll still need lots of fluids and rest.

name: Nyquil
description: This is nighttime cold and flu medication. It's useful when trying to sleep with a head full of virions. It will cause drowsiness.

name: inhaler
description: This is an albuterol inhaler.  Used in the treatment of bronchospasm, it is a lifeline for people with asthma.  This is a mild stimulant so it may cause nervousness or tremors.

name: codeine
description: This is a mild opiate used in the suppression of pain, cough, and other ailments.  While relatively weak for a narcotic, it is still addictive, with a potential for overdose.

name: oxycodone
description: This is a strong semi-synthetic narcotic used in the treatment of intense pain. It's highly addictive.

name: tramadol
description: This is a painkiller used to manage moderate pain.  The effects last for several hours, but are relatively subdued for an opioid.

name: Xanax
description: These are antianxiety agents with a powerful sedative effects. It may cause dissociation and loss of memory.  It is dangerously addictive, and withdrawal from regular use will be prolonged.

name: Adderall
description: These are medical grade amphetamine salts, commonly prescribed to treat hyperactive attention deficits. It suppresses the appetite, and is quite addictive.

name: Thorazine
description: This is antipsychotic medication. It is used to stabilize brain chemistry and it can arrest hallucinations and other symptoms of psychosis. It also carries a sedative effect.

name: Prozac
description: This is a common and popular antidepressant. It will elevate mood, and can profoundly affect the action of other drugs.  It is only rarely habit-forming, though adverse reactions are not uncommon.

name: cigarettes
description: This is a mixture of dried tobacco leaf, pesticides and chemical additives, all rolled into a filtered paper tube. Stimulates mental acuity and reduces appetite. They are highly addictive and hazardous to your health.

name: cannabis
description: These are the dried flower buds and leaves harvested from a psychoactive variety of hemp plant. They are used to reduce nausea, stimulate appetite and elevate mood. It can be habit-forming, and adverse reactions are possible.

name: hemp seeds
description: These are some deeds of the cannabis plant. They're filled with vitamins, and they can be roasted or eaten raw.

name: cocaine
description: This is crystalline extract of the coca leaf, or at least, a white powder with some of that in it. This is a topical analgesic, it is more commonly used for its stimulatory properties. It's highly addictive.

name: methamphetamine
description: This is a profoundly addictive and powerful stimulant. While extremely effective at enhancing alertness, it is hazardous to health and the risk of an adverse reaction is great.

name: heroin
description: This is an extremely strong opioid narcotic derived from morphine. It's incredibly addictive, the risk of overdose is extreme, and the drug is contraindicated for nearly all medical purposes.

name: cigars
description: This is a tobacco leaf stuffed with more chopped and fermented tobacco leaves. It's addictive and hazardous to your health. This is a vice that's guaranteed to turn you into a god damned sexual tyrannosaurus.

name: antibiotics
description: This is antibacterial medication designed to prevent or stop the spread of infection.

name: fungicide
description: This is antifungal medication designed to destroy fungal infections and force spores from the body.

name: poppy sleep
description: This is a potent sleep aid extracted from mutated poppy seeds. It's effective, but as an opiate, it may be addictive.

name: poppy painkillers
description: This is potent opioid palliative produced by the refining of a mutated poppy. While notably devoid of euphoric or sedative effects, as an opiate it may still be addictive.

name: crack
description: These are deprotonated cocaine crystals, which are incredibly addictive and deleterious to brain chemistry.

name: disinfectant
description: This is a powerful disinfectant commonly used for contaminated wounds.

name: mayonnaise
description: This is good old-fashioned mayo. It tastes great on sandwiches.

name: ketchup
description: This is good old-fashioned ketchup. It tastes great on hotdogs.

name: mustard
description: This is good old-fashioned mustard. It tastes great on hamburgers.

name: pickle
description: This is a pickled cucumber. It's rather sour but good and basically lasts forever.

name: paper
description: This is a piece of paper. It could be used for tinder.

name: fried SPAM
description: This is some fried spam. Surprisingly, this SPAM is actually pretty tasty.

name: strawberry surprise
description: This is a tincture of strawberries left to ferment with a few other choice ingredients offer up a surprisingly palatable mixture; you barely even have to force yourself to drink it after the first few gulps.

name: boozeberry
description: This fermented blueberry mixture is surprisingly hearty, though the soup-like consistency is slightly unsettling no matter how much you drink.

name: methacola
description: This is a potent cocktail of amphetamines, caffeine and corn syrup. This stuff will put a spring in your step, a fire in your eye, and a bad case of tachycardia tremors in your somersaulting heart.

name: tainted tornado
description: This is a frothing slurry of alcohol-soaked zombie flesh and rotten blood, it smells almost as bad as it looks.  The mixture has sterilized, in theory, but that doesn't make it safe to drink.

name: cooked strawberries
description: This is like strawberry jam, only without sugar.

name: cooked blueberries
description: This is like blueberry jam, only without sugar.

name: strawberry jam
description: These are fresh strawberries, cooked with sugar to make them last longer.

name: blueberry jam
description: These are fresh blueberries, cooked with sugar to make them last longer.

name: cheeseburger
description: This is a sandwich of minced meat and cheese with condiments. The apex of pre-cataclysm culinary achievement.

name: hamburger
description: This is a sandwich of minced meat with condiments.

name: blt
description: This is a bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich on toasted bread.

name: cheese
description: This is a block of yellow processed cheese.

name: cheese spread
description: This is a can of processed cheese spread.

name: pink tablets
description: These are tiny pink candies shaped like hearts, already dosed with some sort of drug. It's really only useful for entertainment. It will cause hallucinations.

name: chewing gum
description: This is bright pink chewing gum. It's sugary, sweet, and bad for your teeth.

name: nicotine gum
description: This is mint flavored nicotine chewing gum. It's intended for smokers who desire to quit.

name: vinegar
description: This is some shockingly tart white vinegar.

name: cooking oil
description: This is thin yellow vegetable oil used for cooking.

name: pickled veggy
description: This is a serving of crisply brined and canned vegetable matter. It's tasty and nutritious.

name: pickled meat
description: This is a serving of crisply brined and canned meat. It's tasty and nutritious.

name: pickled punk
description: This is a serving of crisply brined and canned human flesh. Tasty and nutritious if you're into that sort of thing.

name: water purification tablets
description: Intended for the clarification and disinfection of unsafe drinking water, these halazone-based purification tablets remove dangerous contaminants using powerful chemicals.

name: hemostatic powder
description: This is a powdered antihemorrhagic compound that reacts with blood to immediately form a gel-like substance which stops bleeding.

name: fungal seeds
description: These are some fungal seeds.

name: chocolate-covered coffee beans
description: These are roasted coffee beans coated with dark chocolate, a natural source of concentrated caffeine.

name: fast noodles
description: These are some so-called ramen noodles. Can be eaten raw, if you're getting desperate.

name: pear
description: This is a juicy, bell-shaped pear. Yum! However, it is amongst the more deceptive of fruits, and is not to be trusted.

name: grapefruit
description: This is a citrus fruit, whose taste ranges from sour to semi-sweet.

name: cherries
description: This is a small red, sweet fruit which grows in trees.

name: plums
description: This is a handful of large, purple plums. Healthy and good for your digestion.

name: grapes
description: This is a cluster of seedless grapes.

name: pineapple
description: This is a large, spiky pineapple. This is a bit sour, though.

name: coconut
description: This is a fruit with hard and hairy shell.

name: peach
description: This fruit's large pit is surrounded by its tasty flesh.

name: cranberries
description: These are small, sour red berries. They're good for your health, or so you've heard.

name: French fries
description: This is a box of fast-food fried potatoes.  Somehow, they're still edible.

name: protein powder
description: Raw, refined protein. While quite nutritious, it is difficult to enjoy in its pure form.

name: protein drink
description: This is a thin slurry of refined protein mixed with water. While quite nutritious, it is not particularly tasty.

name: protein shake
description: This is a thick and tasty beverage made from pure refined protein and nutritious fruit.

name: watermelon
description: This is a fruit, bigger than your head. It is very juicy!

name: melon
description: This is a large and very sweet fruit.

name: raspberries
description: This is a sweet red berry.

name: malted milk balls
description: These are malted milk balls. It's crunchy sugar in chocolate capsules. They're surprisingly legal and stimulating.

name: blackberries
description: These are some blackberries. This is a darker cousin of raspberry.

name: cooked fruit
description: This is some cooked fruit. It's like fruit jam, only without sugar.

name: fruit jam
description: This is a mix of fresh fruit, cooked with sugar to make it last longer.

name: fruit juice
description: This is a some juice, freshly-squeezed from real fruit! It's tasty and nutritious.

name: mango
description: This is a fleshy fruit with large pit.

name: pomegranate
description: This is a thick, red pomegranate. Under this pomegranate's spongy skin lies hundreds of fleshy seeds.

name: rhubarb
description: These are the sour stems of the rhubarb plant, often used in baking pies.

name: peppermint patties
description: This is a big bag of soft chocolate-covered peppermint patties... yum!

name: dehydrated meat
description: These are dehydrated meat flakes. With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.

name: rehydrated meat
description: These are reconstituted meat flakes, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.

name: dehydrated vegetables
description: These are dehydrated vegetable flakes. With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.

name: rehydrated vegetables
description: These are reconstituted vegetable flakes, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.

name: dehydrated fruit
description: These are dehydrated fruit flakes. With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.

name: rehydrated fruit
description: These are reconstituted fruit flakes, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.

name: Necco wafers
description: This is a big bag of candy wafers, in assorted flavors: orange, lemon, lime, clove, chocolate, wintergreen, cinnamon, and licorice. Yum!

name: papaya
description: This is a very sweet and soft tropical fruit.

name: kiwi
description: This is a large, brown and fuzzy-skinned berry. It's delicious insides are green.

name: apricot
description: This is a smooth-skinned fruit, related to the peach.
